summary: I am driven by the fascinating link between disrupted electrophysiological activation patterns and structural remodelling of the heart. I am predominantly involved in clinical research concerning dyssynchronous heart failure and Cardiac Resynchronization Therapy. My other interest lies in bridging the knowledge gap between exercise physiology and heart failure.
